name: THE FLASHBACK
description:
2D Platformer shooter with unique locomotion mechanics.

For reasons only you know, traverse the levels to recover the Flashback: a camera that can see the past.

Direction, Code, Visual Art, Sound Effects by Connor Robb

Music and Ambient Effects by Anne Robb

Particle Systems by Maddy Robb

Free sound samples from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com (Awesome dude!)

Note on sounds: The vast majority of the samples I used were from the above link, but none were used as-is.  Each one was modified, layered, chopped up, etc.
